class Card[source]

Card(value, color)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def generate_random_card():
    possible_values = [i for i in range(6, 15)]
    possible_colors = ['heart', 'spade', 'club', 'diamond']
    return Card(random.sample(possible_values,1)[0], random.sample(possible_colors,1)[0])
